sentences.en: A dictionary lists the words, a grammar states the rules.
sentences.cn: 词典收列单词，语法书讲解语法规则。
扎实的语法基本功训练

sentences.en: A language teacher should initiate pupils into the elements of grammar.
sentences.cn: 语言老师应该把基本语法教给学生.

sentences.en: As far as grammar is concerned, I have grasped it.
sentences.cn: 就语法而言, 我已经掌握了.

sentences.en: At his grammar school he is remembered for being bad at games.
sentences.cn: 在文法学校他因不善于玩游戏为大家所熟知。

sentences.en: Beginners are too apt to make mistakes in grammar.
sentences.cn: 初学者极易犯语法错误.

sentences.en: He has a good grasp [ mastery ] of English grammar.
sentences.cn: 他英语语法学得很扎实.

sentences.en: He is in the third year at Leeds Grammar School.
sentences.cn: 他在利兹文法学校念3年级。

sentences.en: He was known for his poor grammar and punctuation.
sentences.cn: 他不通语法和乱用标点是出了名的。

sentences.en: Her mother bought a handbook of English grammar for her last Sunday.
sentences.cn: 上星期天她母亲给她买了一本英语语法手册.

sentences.en: His vocabulary was sound and his grammar excellent.
sentences.cn: 他的词汇丰富，语法也很精通。

sentences.en: The book deals with some of the oddities of grammar and spelling.
sentences.cn: 这本书专讲语法和拼写方面的某些不规则现象。

sentences.en: The book deals with the essentials of English grammar.
sentences.cn: 这本书论述英语语法的要点.

sentences.en: The book seems to be more a dictionary than one on grammar.
sentences.cn: 与其说这是本语法书,倒不如说是一本词典.

sentences.en: This grammar is easy to understand.

words.tran_cn: 文法的；符合语法规则的

phrases.tran_cn: n. （英）文法学校；（美）初级中学

trans.tran_cn: 语法，语法书，（学术的）基本原理，（人的）语言知识及运用能力
trans.tran_en: the rules by which words change their forms and are combined into sentences, or the study or use of these rules
